title: Junior Software Developer
description: We are looking for a junior developer to help maintain and improve internal tools. You will work with a small agile team and receive mentorship from senior engineers.
requirements: 1-2 years experience or relevant projects; familiarity with Python or JavaScript; willingness to learn; teamwork
benefits: Health and dental after 3 months; paid training; hybrid work option

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our growing fintech startup to build and maintain APIs for payment processing. Some on-call work may be expected during product launches.
requirements: 3+ years backend experience; REST APIs; SQL/NoSQL; cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure)

title: QA Automation Engineer
description: You will be responsible for writing automated tests and improving test coverage. Manual testing may be required during peak releases.
requirements: Experience with test frameworks; scripting knowledge; attention to detail

title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Seeking a frontend developer to work on our e-commerce storefront. You will collaborate with designers to implement responsive, accessible UIs.
requirements: Proficiency in React or Vue; HTML/CSS/JS; familiarity with accessibility standards
benefits: RRSP matching; health benefits; education budget

title: Retail Sales Associate
description: We are hiring a sales associate to support customers, restock shelves, and handle basic cashier duties. Evening and weekend shifts required.
requirements: Customer service skills; ability to lift up to 25 lbs; basic math

title: Assistant Store Manager
description: Support the store manager in supervising staff, managing inventory, and meeting sales targets. Must be comfortable working extended hours during peak seasons.
requirements: 2+ years retail experience; leadership skills; basic Excel

title: Cashier
description: You will process customer purchases, manage returns, and maintain a clean work area. Must be comfortable standing for long periods.
requirements: Friendly communication; basic POS knowledge; reliability

title: Store Operations Coordinator
description: Help coordinate daily store operations including scheduling, inventory reconciliation, and online order pickups. Occasional overtime may be required without advance notice.
requirements: Retail or operations experience; spreadsheet skills; strong organization
benefits: Health benefits; store discount; limited remote days

title: Registered Practical Nurse
description: Provide patient care in a community clinic, including vital checks, medication administration, and documentation. Some evening shifts required.
requirements: RPN license in Ontario; CPR certification; experience with electronic medical records
benefits: Health and dental; pension plan; paid sick days

title: Clinic Receptionist
description: You will schedule appointments, verify insurance details, and support patients at the front desk. High-stress environment at peak times.
requirements: Strong communication; basic computer skills; ability to multitask

title: Laboratory Technician
description: Assist with sample preparation, basic lab tests, and data entry. Work may include handling biological materials and working some weekends.
requirements: Lab diploma or equivalent; attention to detail; data entry skills

title: Healthcare Data Coordinator
description: Support analysis of healthcare utilization data. You will clean and organize datasets and produce basic reports used for planning.
requirements: Excel or BI tools; experience with data cleaning; interest in healthcare systems
benefits: Remote work; health benefits; professional development budget

title: Educational Assistant
description: Provide classroom support to teachers, assist with student activities, and help manage classroom behaviour. Some lifting or outdoor supervision may be required.
requirements: Experience working with children; patience; clear communication

title: Tutor - Mathematics
description: Provide one-on-one or small group tutoring in high school math. Sessions may be held online or at local centers. Evening availability required.
requirements: Strong math skills; prior tutoring experience preferred; reliable internet

title: Instructional Designer (Contract)
description: Work with faculty to design and update digital course materials and online learning activities. Short timelines may be required for some deliverables.
requirements: Experience with LMS platforms; instructional design principles; writing skills

title: Student Success Advisor
description: Support students through advising sessions, workshops, and referrals to campus resources. Occasional evening events and weekend open houses.
requirements: Post-secondary degree; counselling or advising experience; strong listening skills
benefits: Pension; health and dental; professional development days

title: Apprentice Electrician
description: Assist licensed electricians with installations, maintenance, and repairs at residential and commercial sites. Work may involve heights and confined spaces.
requirements: Enrolled in or eligible for apprenticeship; ability to lift heavy equipment; safety awareness

title: General Labourer - Construction
description: Support construction crews with site cleanup, material handling, and basic tasks. Work is physically demanding and outdoors in all weather.
requirements: Ability to lift 50 lbs; safety boots; willingness to work early mornings

title: HVAC Technician
description: Install, maintain, and repair heating and cooling systems for residential clients. On-call rotation for emergency calls, including nights and weekends.
requirements: HVAC certification; driver's license; customer service skills

title: Plumbing Apprentice
description: Assist plumbers in installing and repairing fixtures in residential and light commercial settings. Training provided on the job.
requirements: Interest in plumbing trade; physical stamina; team player

title: Junior Financial Analyst
description: Support senior analysts with financial modeling, variance analysis, and monthly reporting. Some overtime may be required at month-end.
requirements: Degree in finance, accounting, or related field; Excel proficiency; analytical skills

title: Banking Customer Service Representative
description: Handle client inquiries, process basic transactions, and promote banking products. Sales targets apply but are not clearly defined.
requirements: Customer service experience; comfort discussing financial products; attention to detail

title: Payroll Specialist
description: Manage bi-weekly payroll processing and resolve discrepancies. Must maintain confidentiality and meet strict deadlines.
requirements: Experience with payroll systems; understanding of labour standards; Excel skills
benefits: Hybrid work; health benefits; paid vacation

title: Risk & Compliance Assistant
description: Assist the compliance team with monitoring policies, reviewing documentation, and preparing reports related to financial regulations. May involve reviewing large volumes of text.
requirements: Attention to detail; strong reading comprehension; interest in regulations
benefits: Remote work; flexible hours within business days

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Help maintain and optimize our Android and iOS apps. Occasional support during mobile release days.
requirements: Kotlin/Java or Swift; API integration; Git; UI/UX understanding
benefits: Health and dental; work-from-home flexibility; bonus program

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Build CI/CD pipelines and automate deployment processes. Rotating weekend maintenance may be required.
requirements: Docker/Kubernetes; CI/CD tools; scripting; cloud knowledge
benefits: Stock options; extended health; learning stipend

title: UX Research Assistant
description: Conduct user interviews and usability testing to guide design decisions. Some travel to client sites may be required.
requirements: Interviewing experience; UX research methods; note-taking skills

title: IT Support Technician
description: Provide technical support to staff. Must resolve issues quickly and document troubleshooting steps.
requirements: Customer service; hardware/software troubleshooting; ticket systems

title: Retail Inventory Clerk
description: Track inventory levels, handle stock shipments, and organize storage areas. Heavy lifting required.
requirements: Lifting up to 50 lbs; organization; basic computer skills

title: Retail Visual Merchandiser
description: Design product displays and signage for seasonal campaigns. Must meet strict deadlines around holiday promotions.
requirements: Design sense; retail experience; ability to work quickly

title: Pharmacy Assistant
description: Prepare prescriptions, manage inventory, and communicate with patients. Some evening and weekend shifts required.
requirements: Pharmacy assistant diploma or experience; attention to detail

title: Medical Office Cleaner
description: Maintain cleanliness of exam rooms, washrooms, and waiting areas. Must handle biohazard disposal following procedures.
requirements: Ability to lift 20 lbs; attention to detail; reliable

title: Childcare Assistant
description: Supervise children, lead activities, and assist with meals. Must follow safety and allergy protocols.
requirements: Experience with young children; first aid; patience

title: Online Course Content Reviewer
description: Review digital learning content for accessibility and accuracy. Work is asynchronous with deadlines.
requirements: Attention to detail; writing/editing skills; LMS familiarity

title: Carpenter Apprentice
description: Assist journeyman carpenters with framing, installation, and repairs. Outdoor work in variable weather.
requirements: Interest in woodworking; ability to lift heavy tools

title: Window Installer Helper
description: Support installation teams with preparation and clean-up. Must be comfortable with heights.
requirements: Comfort on ladders; teamwork; lifting 50+ lbs

title: Auto Body Repair Trainee
description: Assist with sanding, buffing, and prep work. May handle chemicals and loud machinery.
requirements: Safety awareness; ability to follow instructions

title: Financial Customer Support Agent
description: Respond to client inquiries about banking products via chat and phone. Commission may apply based on referrals.
requirements: Communication; sales comfort; multitasking; typing speed

title: Accounts Payable Clerk
description: Process invoices and verify transaction records. Must meet accuracy targets to avoid penalties.
requirements: Excel; bookkeeping knowledge; attention to detail

title: Junior Accountant
description: Support senior accountants with journal entries and reconciliations. Overtime may be required in tax season.
requirements: CPA student preferred; Excel; analytical skills

title: Financial Risk Intern
description: Assist with reviewing compliance reports and financial documents. Must maintain confidentiality.
requirements: Excel; attention to detail; interest in finance

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end features for our payroll product ecosystem. Flexible learning budget available.
requirements: React/Node or similar; databases; API design

title: Tech Support Chat Agent
description: Assist customers with troubleshooting banking or login issues through chat only. Fast responses expected.
requirements: Typing speed; customer service; basic troubleshooting

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Work with senior ML engineers to annotate training data and build small model prototypes.
requirements: Python; interest in ML; data labeling
